title: On Calibration of Modern Neural Networks
key_finding: Temperature scaling reduces ECE by 50-80%. Requires logit access.
caveats: Pre-LLM era. Direct applicability to black-box APIs limited.

title: Can LLMs Express Their Uncertainty?
key_finding: Verbalized confidence is biased. Budget-CoCoA: 3 API calls measure agreement.
caveats: Tested on GPT-4, Claude 2. May not generalize to newer models.
